Column.name: Template
Column.value: $COMMENT="Do not generate operations with the stereotype comment"

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$bases=%ClassInherits% %if $bases != ""% $bases=" " + $bases %endIf% $generic=%list="ClassParameter" @separator=", "% %if $generic != ""% $generic="<" + $generic + ">" %endIf%
$annotations=%classTag:"annotations"% %REPLACE($annotations, "@", "\n @")%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(classScope)% %classStereotype=="static" ? "static" : ""% %classIsLeaf == "T" ? "final" : ""%
%if elemType == "Interface"% %PI=""% %classStereotype=="annotation" ? "@"% interface %className%$generic$bases %endTemplate%
%classAbstract=="T" ? "abstract" : ""% %classStereotype=="enumeration" ? "enum" : "class"% %className%$generic$bases
%if genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% %if genOptStmJavaObjectOriented == "T"% implements StateMachineLib.BehavioredClassifier %else% implements StateMachineContext %endIf% %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classStereotype=="enumeration"% %if attStereotype=="enum" or attIsEnumLiteral=="T"% %PI=""% %attName% %attTag:"arguments" ? "(" value ")"% %endTemplate% %endIf%
%attTag:"Attribute"% $annotations=%attTag:"annotations"% %REPLACE($annotations, "@", "\n @")%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(attScope)% %attStatic=="T" ? "static" : ""% %attConst=="T" ? "final" : ""% %attVolatile=="T" ? "volatile" : ""% %attTag:"transient"=="true" ? "transient" : ""%
%ConvertSqlType(attType)%
%PI=""% %attName% %if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% %attContainerType% %endIf% %attInitial ? " = " value% ;

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precisition"% $ParamType = "double" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value: $COMMENT="Do not generate attribute with the tx-attribute comment"

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%opTag:"Attribute"% %opTag:"annotations"% %PI=" "%
%opReturnType%%opReturnArray=="T" ? "[]" : ""% %opName%(%list="Parameter" @separator=", "%) %if opTag:"returning" != ""% returning %opTag:"returning"!="true" ? "(" value ")"% %endIf% %if opTag:"throwing" != ""% throwing %opTag:"throwing"!="true" ? "(" value ")"% %endIf% %opTag:"throws"=="" ? "": "\n throws " value% : %opBehavior%

Column.name: Template
Template
Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precisition"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "integer"% $ParamType = "int" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if attName == "uuid" or attName == "history"% %endTemplate%
$propertyName=%attName% $propertyName=%REMOVE_PREFIX($propertyName,genOptPropertyPrefix)% $propertyName=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "pascal case", "camel case")% $propertyName=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "HT()HT", "Ht()ht")%
$sourceName=%CONVERT_NAME(className, "Ht()ht", "ht()ht")% + "_" + %attName% %if attAlias != ""% $sourceName=%attAlias% %endIf% $targetName=%genOptJavaSetPrefix% + $propertyName
$type=%ConvertSqlType(attType)% %if $type == "String"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", \"\" ) );" %elseIf $type == "int"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Integer.valueOf(0) ).intValue() );" %elseIf $type == "long"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Long.valueOf(0) ).longValue() );" %elseIf $type == "float"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Float.valueOf(0) ).floatValue() );" %elseIf $type == "double"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Double.valueOf(0) ).doubleValue() );" %endIf%
$program

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if packagePath == ""% %list="Namespace" @separator="
"% %list="Class" @separator="
"% %endTemplate%
%if packageName =="domain"%
Package { %TRANSFORM_CURRENT()%
Class { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("DAO_Generation", classGUID)% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("name","stereotype","language")% name="DAO_Generation_Class" stereotype="dao generator" language="Java"
Attribute { name="daoGenerator" type="DAO_Generation_Class" scope="private" default="null" static="true" }
Operation { name="of" stereotype="built in" type="DAO_Generation_Class" static="true"
code="//singleton
if(daoGenerator==null)
 daoGenerator = new DAO_Generation_Class();

return daoGenerator;" }
%list="Class" @separator="
" @indent=" "% } } %else% Package { %TRANSFORM_CURRENT()%
%list="Namespace" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="Class" @separator="
" @indent=" "% } %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precision"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "integer"% $ParamType = "int" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value: $COMMENT="Do not generate operations with the stereotype index"

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value: $type=%CONVERT_TYPE("Java",attType)% $COMMENT="Note: The 'static' keyword below avoids a 'static' attribute in the Java class for the primary key." $COMMENT="Needs to skip processing 'static' because it is not possible to set the value 'false'." Attribute { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE()% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("scope","type","stereotype","static")% scope=%qt%%attScope == "Public" ? "Private" : value%%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_TYPE("Java",attType)%%qt% type=%qt%%ConvertSqlType($type)%%qt% %if classStereotype=="enumeration"% stereotype="enum" %else% stereotype=%qt%%attStereotype%%qt% %endIf% }

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
$type=%linkAttName%
$collectionClass=%COLLECTION_CLASS("Java")% %if $collectionClass != "" and linkCard != "" and linkCard != "0" and linkCard != "0..1" and linkCard != "1"% $type=$collectionClass %endIf%
$name = %linkAttRole% %if $name == ""% $name = %REPLACE(genOptDefaultAssocAttName,"$LinkClass",linkAttName)% %endIf%
%Properties($name,$type)%

$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precisition"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "integer"% $ParamType = "int" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
Interface { %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("language")% name=%qt%%className%Repository%qt% language="Java" Parent { name=%qt%CrudRepository<%className%, String>%qt% type="Implements" } Tag { name="dataClassname" value=%qt%%className%%qt% } Tag { name="dataElemtype" value=%qt%%elemType%%qt% } %list="ClassParameter" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="ClassBase" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="ClassInterface" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="InnerClass" @separator="
" @indent=" "% $COMMENT="This causes some trouble" $COMMENT=%if elemType!="Interface"% $COMMENT=%list="Attribute" @separator="
" @indent=" "% $COMMENT=%endIf%
$T=%className% Operation { name="queryByUuidAndHistory" stereotype="query" scope="" type=%qt%List<$T>%qt% Parameter { name="uuid" type="String" } Parameter { name="history" type="String" } code=%qt%%qt% Tag{name="attribute_name" value="uuidAndHistory"} }
%list="Attribute__AsProperties" @separator="
" @indent=" " attScope=="Public"% %list="Operation" @separator="
" @indent=" "% } %list="Connector" @separator="
"%
